dmca.title: Netkreations.com unauthorized reselling
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: Craig Rowe [mailto:craig@growthorchard.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 20, 2005 8:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Netkreations.com unauthorized reselling

Hello,

A client of yours, Netkreations.com is reselling my web sites without
authorization.  I sold him the sites on eBay and he is now posting them
without resell rights on eBay again.  See the following auction he is
selling:

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=7574098190

Here is one of my auctions, and I'm the original owner of these site
files:
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=7573692642

After contacting Netkreations.com about the infraction through eBay, he
responded with the following today:

----
The auction didnt say resell rights werent included, i checked specifically.


Thanks,
Scott
----

The auction does state resell rights are not included at the bottom, and he
clearly does not have rights to just resell any digital product from your
servers that he chooses.  Please let me know when the infracting material
has been removed.

Thank you,

Craig Rowe
AdsenseReady.com
